daily_decluttering_tasks.task: Clean out one kitchen drawer and get rid of unused utensils.
Declutter your bathroom countertop and organize toiletries.
Sort through one shelf in your closet and donate unused clothes.
Tidy up the junk drawer and toss or relocate random items.
Go through your fridge and throw out expired food.
Declutter your nightstand and only keep essentials.
Organize your desk and clear off unnecessary papers and items.
Sort through one bin, box, or storage container.
Clean out your purse, backpack, or daily bag.
Go through your shoe rack and donate or toss worn-out shoes.
